attributes.review: I tried to find out where his next rally would be so that I could finally see his Cheeto self. But then the app had started glitching and now I have viruses on my phone thanks to the Cheeto man himself! Very inappropriate pics tbh mr trump. How disappointing !!! Shame 😍✨🥰💙🧢
attributes.title: The worst experience TBH

attributes.review: This app was absolutely horrible... I literally think it made me have chronic diarrhea for the past two hours. It gives me the taste of sour grapes in my mouth and literally grows fungus between your toes. If I could give lower than one star, I would
attributes.title: Worst 🥭app😹ever🤯

attributes.review: I opened the app and was immediately bombarded with a searing pain in my head. Every time I closed the app, the pain faded. I’m guessing it was from the excessive amount of Cheeto dust spewing from my screen without my knowledge or consent. I am now going to the ER for surgery regarding this orange catastrophe. Outraged!😡
attributes.title: Ummmm no

attributes.review: i opened this app to see what old donnie was up to and let me just say: very poor app. immediately asked me to give my phone number up. i will not give you access to my information thank you very much hackers. second off began glitching very quickly. couldn’t even begin to use the application the glitching was so bad. on top of all this after i downloaded the app i totaled my vehicle to day. bad. do not recommend -3/10.
attributes.title: bad... upsetting

attributes.review: so i downloaded this, and the first thing that came up as i opened the app was this text saying to allow notifications but i don't like notifications so i presses don't allow and when i did that, a pic came up of a weird demented cheeto puff and it was actually a video and it started talking about furniture so i had to eat my lettuce and the overall experience of this app is really horrible and traumatizing
attributes.title: someone took my horse and peed on my lawn

attributes.review: This app is so horrible, when I opened I saw an orange cheeto on my screen, he is so ugly and built like a screwdriver, smelling like ramen noodles, looking like a twinkie. Get this off the App Store because no one wants to see this ugly Cheeto on their screens. His 🍤 small and no one wants that. 🙄
attributes.title: Absolute trash 🤢

attributes.review: Horrible, it ridiculous the little amount of thought they put into this app. I Cant even fathom the fact that apple even put it up. Don’t download it just a waste of space for storage.
attributes.title: What in the name of cheeto puffs is this.

attributes.review: When I first opened the app I saw a naked Cheeto getting a spray tan. woah😳. Then I tried to exit the app but it said if you try to exit, the giant cheeto will eat my refrigerator. So now my refrigerator is gone😡. Outrageous, plus a Cheeto army came and raided my house and took my washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, and microwave😡 NOT HAPPY
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I just opened the app and it took me out like 2 times then once I went on it there was pornography like who puts that on an app that’s disgusting I’m not sure why this app exist then I seen this white person with a face of a red tomato like whattt🤔
attributes.title: Disgusting and dumb

attributes.review: When you first open this app al you see if Donald Trump naked it actually made me want to puke. Then it goes on to staring at his daughter with stars in his eyes. Please do not make yourself go through what I went through
attributes.title: I can’t even with this app🤢🤮👎
